author: stephenh
msg: - Updated build-torque.xml with new properties to control where to load schema and put output files for more fine-grained control and fitting torque into any source tree.
- Added src/conf/default.properties to map from old properties to new.
- Updated build.xml to put the default.properties into the jar.

author: stephenh
msg: Removed the app-data element from the generated schema.xml as brought up by Thomas Wheeler on torque-user.

author: stephenh
msg: Updated beanutils and stratum versions to match project.xml.

author: stephenh
msg: With Texen's PropertiesUtils, using generator.templatePath is deprecated.

author: kschrader
msg: Make the test-cases work here again.
